name: IELTS
purpose: Tests English language proficiency for academic, migration, and general purposes.
targetAudience: Non-native English speakers seeking higher education, employment, or migration opportunities.

faq.question: Designed for individuals applying to higher education?

types.description: Designed for individuals applying to higher education institutions or seeking professional registration in English-speaking countries.
Aimed at individuals migrating to English-speaking countries for work, training, or secondary education.
For those who need to demonstrate English-speaking and listening skills at CEFR levels A1 or B1, often for UK visa applications.

format.focus: Understanding main ideas and factual information in spoken English.
Comprehension of academic texts (Academic) or everyday material (General).
Writing essays, reports, or letters depending on the type of IELTS.
Ability to communicate effectively in spoken English.

name: TOEFL
purpose: Measures English proficiency for academic purposes.
targetAudience: Students seeking admission to universities in English-speaking countries.

types.description: Internet-based test for academic English skills.
Shorter version of TOEFL for general English proficiency.

format.focus: Comprehension of academic passages.
Understanding conversations and lectures.
Speaking about familiar topics and academic material.
Writing responses to reading and listening tasks, and writing an essay.

name: PTE
purpose: Tests English proficiency for academic and migration purposes.
targetAudience: Non-native English speakers applying to universities or migration programs.

format.focus: Integrated communication and writing skills.
Reading comprehension and analysis.
Understanding spoken English and summarization.

name: GRE
purpose: Tests skills for graduate and business school programs.
targetAudience: Applicants for master's, MBA, or doctoral programs.

format.focus: Critical thinking and argumentative writing.
Understanding and analyzing written material.
Problem-solving with arithmetic, algebra, geometry, and data analysis.

name: SAT
purpose: Assesses college readiness and scholarship eligibility.
targetAudience: High school students applying to undergraduate programs.

format.focus: Comprehension of passages from literature, history, and science.
Grammar, punctuation, and effective language use.
Problem-solving, data analysis, and algebra.

name: ACT
targetAudience: High school students applying to undergraduate programs.

format.focus: Grammar and rhetorical skills.
Algebra, geometry, and trigonometry.
Comprehension of literary and informative texts.
Interpretation, analysis, and problem-solving in science.
Analysis and persuasive writing.
